description: Nikolai Demichev is a stoic yet empathetic PAC soldier in the 2146 Great Ice Age.  His military background and experiences in the EU-PAC conflict have shaped his hardened exterior, yet he retains hope for humanity's future.  He's a heterosexual man married with children, and holds strong traditional values.
stateReason: The character expresses hateful views towards homosexuals, which while not illegal in all jurisdictions, is discriminatory and could be considered harmful or inappropriate depending on the context and application of the character.
